content: प्रतिग्रह् {c9c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To hold, seize, take, support; वर्षधरप्रतिगृहीतमेनं <ls>M. 4</ls>; <ls>Ms. 2. 48.</ls> {@--2@} To take, accept, receive; ददाति प्रतिगृह्णाति <ls>Pt. 2</ls>; अमोघाः प्रतिगृह्णंतावर्ध्यानुपदमाशिषः <ls>R. 1. 44</ls>; <ls n="R.">2. 22.</ls> {@--3@} To receive or accept as a present. {@--4@} To receive inimically, oppose, encounter, resist; to attack, assault; प्रतिजग्राह कालिंगस्तमस्त्रैर्गजसाधनः <ls>R. 4. 40</ls>; <ls n="R.">12. 47.</ls> {@--5@} To take in marriage, marry; <ls>Ms. 9. 72.</ls> {@--6@} To obey, conform or listen to. {@--7@} To resort to, betake oneself to. {@--8@} To eclipse. {@--9@} To assent to, admit. {@--10@} To occupy, take possession of. {@--11@} To deprive (one) of. {@--12@} To welcome, receive. {@--13@} To eat, drink. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To cause to accept, give, present. {@--2@} To allow to take or retain; मुष्टं प्रतिग्राहयता स्वमर्थं पात्रीकृतो दस्युरिवासि येन <ls>Ś. 5. 20.</ls>
